channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In 'Hysterical,' a podcaster unpacks a mysterious contagious illness among teen girls
item.description: Dan Taberski won a "Podcast of the Year" award for his investigation of a 2011 outbreak of tics and spasms in one high school. He's also the creator o...

item.title: Supreme Court upholds Tennessee law that bars gender-affirming care for minors
item.description: At issue was a Tenneessee law that bars minors from accessing gender-affirming care as they transition from their sex assigned at birth.

item.title: Iran warns of 'irreparable consequences' as Trump weighs U.S. role in conflict

item.title: Greetings from Shenyang, China, where workers sort AI data in 'Severance'-like ways
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares snapshots of moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: 'Labubu' is a plush toy that is causing a frenzy. Here's its origin story
item.description: Labubus are a global sensation — sparking long lines outside toy stores, selling out online within minutes, and listing for double or triple their ori...

item.title: Trump weighs joining Iran strikes after calling for 'unconditional surrender'
item.description: US strikes could involve using superior weaponry to hit an underground nuclear site, sources say.

item.title: Trump says "I may do it, I may not do it" on joining Israeli strikes against Iran
item.description: President Trump is still weighing the U.S. role in the current Israel-Iran conflict surrounding nuclear weapons. CBS News' Holly Williams has the late...

item.title: Trump says no decision yet on joining Israel's strikes on Iran
item.description: As Israel continues striking Iran, Trump says he's still considering whether the U.S. military should provide direct support in an increasingly deadly...

item.title: Purdue Pharma’s $7B opioid settlement could advance after all 50 states back it

item.title: Lawyer who defended drug lord 'El Chapo' elected as judge
item.description: Silvia Delgado was one of the most controversial candidates to run in Mexico's judicial election.

item.title: Lone Air India survivor carries coffin of brother killed in crash
item.description: A visibly upset Ramesh was overcome with grief carrying his brother's coffin to the crematorium.

item.title: The skincare craze sweeping Gen Alpha — and why doctors are sounding the alarm
item.description: CBS News' Julie Watts investigates a viral skincare trend among tweens and teens.

item.title: 'What should we do?' Seeking clarity in Tehran as Israeli jets fly overhead
item.description: BBC Persian's Kasra Naji says his sister is among those who want to know where the conflict with Israel is leading.

item.title: Kenyan 'miracle babies' pastor dies in road crash
item.description: Televangelist Gilbert Deya has died in an accident and at least 30 other people are reportedly injured.

item.title: Man who fired at gunman and killed Utah ‘No Kings’ protester was a safety volunteer, organizers say
